mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member VALUES ( MEM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{pass}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{birthday},#{email}, #{mobno}, #{status},#{category}, sysdate, null, null)
mapper.select: SELECT pass FROM member WHERE id = #{id} and status like 'nomal'
SELECT id FROM member WHERE email = #{email} and status like 'nomal'
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET pass=#{pass} WHERE id = #{id} and status like 'nomal'
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE id = #{id} and status like 'nomal'
SELECT category FROM member WHERE id = #{id} and status like 'nomal'
SELECT COUNT(inquNum) FROM inquiry WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT inquNum, content, id, regDate, answer, answerId, answerDate, status FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rm, inpu.* FROM (SELECT i.inquNum inquNum, i.content content, m.id id, i.regDate regDate, i.answer answer, a.id answerId, i.answerDate, i.status status From inQuiry i, member m, member a WHERE i.id=m.id AND nvl(i.anAnswer, '관리자') = a.id ORDER BY i.inquNum desc ) inpu ) WHERE rm BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE member set category = #{category} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE member set category = 0 WHERE id = #{id}
